mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderitems (product_id AS "productId", order_id AS "orderId", amount) VALUES (#{productId}, #{orderId}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id AS "productId", order_id AS "orderId", amount FROM orderitems WHERE productId = #{productId}
SELECT i.product_id AS "productId", i.order_id AS "orderId", i.amount FROM orderitems i JOIN orders o ON i.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.email = #{email}
